1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include <interactive_robot_hand/Hand.h>
3 #include <interactive_robot_hand/HandState.h>
4 #include <interactive_robot_hand/Grip.h>
5 #include <threemxl/C3mxlROS.h>
6 
7 using namespace robot_hand;
8 
9 Hand::Hand() : Node() {
10 
11  // Create configuration
12  config = new CDxlConfig();
13 
14  // Open serial port
15  serial_port = new LxSerial();
16  serial_port->port_open("/dev/ttyUSB0", LxSerial::RS485_FTDI);
17  serial_port->set_speed(LxSerial::S921600);
18 
19  // Create 3mxl motor
20  motor = new C3mxl();
21 
22  // Set parameters for motor
23  motor->setSerialPort(serial_port);
24  motor->setConfig(config->setID(109));
25  motor->init(false);
26  motor->set3MxlMode(CURRENT_MODE);
27 
28  // Start subscription
29  subscriber = nh.subscribe<interactive_robot_hand::Grip>("/brain/grip", 1, &Hand::grip, this);
30  publisher = nh.advertise<interactive_robot_hand::HandState>("state", 1);
31 
32  // Notify user
33  ROS_INFO("Created hand");
34 }
35 
36 Hand::~Hand(void) {
37  motor->setCurrent(0);
38  serial_port->port_close();
39  delete config;
40  delete motor;
41  delete serial_port;
42  ROS_INFO("Deleted hand");
43 }
44 
45 void Hand::grip(const interactive_robot_hand::Grip::ConstPtr& msg) {
46 
47  // Get the message force, invert it when opening the hand
48  float force = msg->force;
49  if(msg->open) {
50  force *= -1;
51  }
52 
53  // Calculate the correct current based on the force and send it to the motor
54  float current = -(0.030246 * force - 0.0270571);
55  motor->setCurrent(current);
56 
57  // Publish the hand state message
58  state.open = msg->open;
59  publisher.publish(state);
60  ros::spinOnce();
61 
62  // Notify user
63  ROS_INFO("Generating current [%f]", current);
64 }
65 
66 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
67  ros::init(argc, argv, "hand");
68  Hand hand;
69  hand.spin();
70  return 0;
71 }
